title: Tag
description: A `Tag` entity is used for classification or categorization. It is a term defined under `Classification` entity. Tags are used to label the entities and entity fields, such as Tables, and Columns.

id.description: Unique identifier of this entity instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this tag.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Unique name of the tag of format `Classification.tag1.tag2`.

classification.description: Reference to the classification that this tag is part of.

parent.description: Reference to the parent tag. When null, the term is at the root of the Classification.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to the tag.

usageCount.description: Count of how many times this tag and children tags are used.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

disabled.description: System tags can't be deleted. Use this flag to disable them.

mutuallyExclusive.description: Children tags under this group are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` the tags from this group are used to **classify** an entity. An entity can only be in one class - example, it can only be either `tier1` or `tier2` and not both. When mutually exclusive is `false`, the tags from this group are used to **categorize** an entity. An entity can be in multiple categories simultaneously - example a customer can be `newCustomer` and `atRisk` simultaneously.

domains.description: Domains the asset belongs to. When not set, the asset inherits the domain from the parent it belongs to.

dataProducts.description: List of data products this entity is part of.

reviewers.description: User references of the reviewers for this tag.
